data.title: Yue Ma on LinkedIn: #entrepreneurship #personalgrowth #mentalfitness #anxiety
data.meta_description:
Be happy you have stress and anxiety.

It's reserved for people who are striving for something bigger than where they are.

#Entrepreneurship #PersonalGrowthâ€¦
data.text:
Life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future Join the only newsletter you need to own your day and elevate to a world class life. Link in profile ðŸ‘ˆ Fortune Favors The Bold. #business #entrepreneurship #stoicism #psychology #performance #performancecoach #selfmastery #isaacvelez

You dreamt it, and here you are. You made the steps to get to where you are now. So if you're ever feeling down, depressed, drained or anything else, just look back and remember, you're way better than where you were then. I believe in you. #motivation #justremember #entrepreneurship

Take a few minutes away from all the chaos and pressure of daily life. In these few minutes take a seat back and look at what GOD has blessed you with. Appreciate the little things like the breakfast you just had this morning. When you do this, you will appreciate your life more and you will remove this mentality of always complaining. One thing I can guarantee you is that you will always find something to complain about, even if you live in a country made with Honey and Milk. #zimbabwe #entrepreneurs #motivation

Take action on your dreams Some of us, we bring our dreams to life, but sometimes we just choose to wake up Why only dream when we sleep, why not dream all the time, and bring our dreams for the world to enjoy Join the only newsletter you need to own your day and elevate to a world class life. Link in profile ðŸ‘ˆ Fortune Favors The Bold. #business #entrepreneurship #stoicism #psychology #performance #performancecoach #selfmastery #isaacvelez

Rewire your desires When you change what you view as pain and what you view as pleasure, You become an unstoppable force, going after meaning and fulfillment, and now looking at it as fulfillment. So why wait to start living with more meaning and fulfillment today, Join the only newsletter you need to own your day and elevate to a world class life. Link in profile ðŸ‘ˆ Fortune Favors The Bold. #business #entrepreneurship #stoicism #psychology #performance #performancecoach #selfmastery #isaacvelez

Change is never linear, it always happen exponentially Nothing happens for 2,3, 4 years of hard work and dedication, and suddenly in 30 days your life is transformed Now you're an overnight success But overnight was years in the making Stay on the path and don't let up, you committed to this for a bigger reason, and the game rewards those who stay for the long term Join the only newsletter you need to own your day and elevate to a world class life. Link in profile ðŸ‘ˆ Fortune Favors The Bold. #business #entrepreneurship #stoicism #psychology #performance #performancecoach #selfmastery #isaacvelez

gentle reminder: if you're stressed about getting back to people, TAKE A BREATH. One of my mentors once said that if people truly want your attention, they'll follow up and in some cases, if they don't follow up, it's a sure indicator that your reply to their first email wasn't worth your stress. #anxiety #gentlereminders #entrepreneurship #mentalwellness
